timeline.author: efge

replies.bodyText: 👍 i'll probably do that kind of cleanup on others independently, then
replies.author: atchertchian

timeline.bodyText: If you make registrationOrder a long then autoboxing will allow you to get rid of the Long.valueOf (another instance below for bindex/setDeploymentOrder)
timeline.author: efge

replies.bodyText: But what if i needed to be able to keep it null (unset), for legacy persisted distribs, typically?
replies.author: atchertchian

replies.bodyText: Well Long.valueOf(registrationOrder++) is never null, so you might as well take advantage of autoboxing here.
replies.author: efge

replies.bodyText: This is on the live distrib (and the same interface is shared with persisted ones)
replies.author: atchertchian
efge

replies.bodyText: Ah! sorry got confused, will do (i thought you were talking about changing from "Long" to "long" in the API, nevermind)
replies.author: atchertchian
